sentences: Dmitry Almazov (Russian: Дми́трий Алма́зов, IPA: [ˈdmʲitrʲɪj ɐlˈmazəf]; born 11 March 1982 in Moscow), mostly known by his stage name Bobina, is a Russian  trance DJ, record producer and radio host.
He has gained global popularity over the years and received support from top artists like Tiesto, Armin van Buuren, Paul Oakenfold, Ferry Corsten, and many others.
2020 "Russia / China in the House" (with Atom Panda)
